issue.title: [Rust] Support display of DictionaryArrays in sql.rs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10167](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10167). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When I try to display a DictionaryArray values, I get either a ??? in sql.rs

This ticket tracks adding proper support for printing these types

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10167?focusedCommentId=17208818) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8333
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8333>
